name: Etrian Mystery Dungeon 2
description:
Etrian Mystery Dungeon 2 (Sekaiju to Fushigi no Danjon 2; lit Yggdrasill Mystery Dungeon 2) is a spin-off of the Etrian Odyssey series and a sequel to Etrian Mystery Dungeon. Like its predecessor, it is a crossover with Spike Chunsoft's Mystery Dungeon series.

Pre-orders and first editions of the game come with a two-disc music album with tracks from across the Etrian series, voted on by fans. There is also a special edition of the game to celebrate the Etrian series' 10th anniversary, containing the game, the music album, a two-hundred page art book, and a collector's box. The game was released in Japan on August 31, 2017.
